description: Bhabhi Ji Ghar Par Hain 2.0 is now available on Z5, bringing back its cult comedy with a spooky flavour. Featuring Shilpa Shinde’s return and a fresh storyline set in Ghunghatganj, the show blends humour, nostalgia, and entertainment for OTT viewers.
title: Bhabhi Ji Ghar Par Hain 2.0 Now Streaming Online: What You Need to Know

description: NASA’s SPHEREx telescope has completed its first all-sky map, revealing hundreds of millions of galaxies and providing data to study the universe’s origin, evolution, and distribution of life-essential elements across cosmic history.
title: NASA’s SPHEREx Telescope Delivers First Full-Sky Map, Unlocking Cosmic Secrets

description: Directed by Susanna Fogel, Ponies is an upcoming thriller web series that stars Emilia Clarke and Haley Lu Richardson in the lead roles. Streaming soon.
title: Ponies OTT Release Date: Know When to Watch This Emilia Clarke and Haley Lu Richardson starrer web series online

description: A robotic arm mastered 1,000 manipulation tasks in one day using MT3 imitation learning, requiring only one demonstration per task and minimal data.
title: Robotic Arm Achieves 1,000 Tasks in a Day Through Innovative Imitation Learning

description: HMD Pulse 2 could be in the works, according to details shared by a tipster. Ahead of any official announcement, the key specifications of the phone have leaked online. The HMD Pulse 2 is said to feature a 6.7-inch display. It could run on a Unisoc T7250 chipset and houses a 5,000mAh battery with support for 20W fast charging. It is expected to come with upgrades over the standard HMD Pulse.
title: HMD Pulse 2 Specifications Leaked; Could Launch With 6.7-Inch Display, 5,000mAh Battery

description: The sub-Rs. 5,000 IEM segment in India now offers strong audio performance with better drivers, tuning, and build quality. Options include single dynamic, hybrid, and multi-driver designs that suit both casual listeners and entry-level audiophiles. Models like the Simgot EW200, KZ Vader, KZ ZSN Pro, Headphone Zone x Tangzu Wan’er S.G. 2, and 7Hz x Crinacle Zero 2 stand out for balanced sound, durable designs, detachable cables, and good compatibility with smartphones and DACs, delivering high value at accessible prices.
title: Best IEMs Under Rs 5,000: KZ Vader, 7Hz x Crinacle Zero 2 and More

description: Here we have listed some best tablets available in India for streaming and binge-watching. The list includes models like OnePlus Pad Go 2, Lenovo Idea Tab Plus and Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra, among others. Customers can compare prices and features of these models to choose the best one that suits their needs.
title: Best Tablets in India for Streaming: OnePlus Pad Go 2, Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra, More

description: OpenAI may soon add a Skills feature to ChatGPT, allowing users to save reusable instructions as shortcuts. Spotted after its rollout in Codex, Skills could reduce repetitive prompting and speed up workflows. The company has not officially confirmed the feature, so details remain tentative.
title: OpenAI Tipped to Add Skills Feature to ChatGPT, Could Be Available as Slash Commands

description: Paramount on Monday amended its $108.4 billion hostile bid for the storied Hollywood studio to bolster its financing. Oracle co-founder Larry Ellison, whose son David owns Paramount, is now personally guaranteeing $40.4 billion of the bid to secure Warner Bros., which owns HBO Max and controls the Harry Potter, Lord of the Rings and Superman franchises.
title: Paramount's New Offer for Warner Bros. Is Not Sufficient, Major Investor Says

description: WhatsApp is testing a new “Connected peripherals” feature on iOS that lets users see devices automatically linked to their account. Rolling out with the iOS beta version 25.37.10.71 via TestFlight, the feature appears in the Linked Devices menu and currently supports the Apple Watch. It shows device details and last activity, improving transparency around message syncing. The feature is available to some beta testers and has also appeared on the stable iOS app, indicating a wider test rollout.
title: WhatsApp Begins Testing Support for Viewing Connected Peripherals

description: Honor Win series is set to launch in China on December 26. Ahead of the unveiling, a tipster has shared the camera specifications of the upcoming Honor Win and Win RT. The design of the phones was recently unveiled. The Honor Win is teased to sport a triple rear camera unit, housed inside a rectangle-shaped module. On the other hand, the Win RT appears with a dual rear camera setup. The standard model is expected to be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC.
title: Honor Win Series Camera Specifications Tipped Days Ahead of China Launch

description: Yann LeCun and Demis Hassabis sparked a public debate on X over whether general intelligence actually exists. The clash reflects deeper differences between Hassabis’ work at Google DeepMind and LeCun’s views shaped at Meta and his new startup, Advanced Machine Intelligence, especially around the feasibility of AGI.
title: Is AGI Possible? Godfather of AI and Google DeepMind Chief Caught in War of Words on Social Media

description: Oppo Enco Buds 3 Pro+ were launched in India on November 18 by the Chinese tech firm. Unveiled as the company's new contender in the budget true wireless stereo (TWS) category, the Enco Buds 3 Pro+ ship with "Smart" active noise cancellation (ANC) and Transparency Mode. It is also claimed to offer up to 12 hours of battery life with ANC off and up to 43 hours of battery life with the charging case. It also ships with three Enco Master EQ presets.
title: Oppo Enco Buds 3 Pro+ Review: Packs a Punch on a Budget

description: The Realme Watch 5 gets most of the fundamentals right. The smartwatch has a design that resembles a product several segments above, a vibrant AMOLED display, reliable day-to-day performance, and surprisingly accurate health tracking for its price. The value proposition is further bolstered by the inclusion of built-in GPS and Bluetooth calling. Despite this, the smartwatch is an easy recommendation for users looking for a feature-rich smartwatch under Rs. 5,000.
title: Realme Watch 5 Review: Apple Watch Vibes Without the Apple Price

description: Apple on Monday released the iOS 26.3 Beta update for iPhone to developers and beta testers. It includes fixes for bugs and software issues that users have experienced in previous iterations. The most notable change, however, concerns third-party accessories, in compliance with the EU’s Digital Markets Act. As per a report, the update streamlines the process of pairing wearables like wireless earphones and smartwatches to iPhone and iPad, while also enabling notification support.
title: Apple's iPhone Could Soon Support Pairing With Wireless Earphones, Third-Party Smartwatches

description: The Indie Game Awards have retracted the awards given to developer Sandfall Interactive for Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 over the studio's use of generative AI. The RPG won Game of the Year and and Debut Game at the Indie Game Awards 2025 on December 18. However, the IGA has strict eligibility criteria that bars generative AI use in game development, which led to Expedition 33 being disqualified.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33's Game of the Year Win at Indie Game Awards Retracted Over Gen AI Use

description: Google has activated its Emergency Location Service (ELS) in India for compatible Android devices. Uttar Pradesh has become state in the country to operationalise the functionality by integrating it with its 112 emergency number. Android users can send their "precise" location to emergency service providers by calling or texting the number. The feature uses GPS, Wi-Fi, and cellular network data to figure out a user's location.
title: Google Launches Emergency Location Service Feature for Android Smartphones in India

description: Anthropic has released an open-source tool called Bloom to test how AI models behave under normal and stressful conditions. Bloom automates behavioural testing by generating scenarios, running them at scale, and scoring responses for traits like bias or sycophancy. Anthropic says it simplifies a process that was previously manual and time-consuming.
title: How Much Water Does AI Use? Consumption Now Exceeds World’s Bottled Water, Suggests New Study

description: Oppo Reno 15 series India launch date and price range have leaked online. An additional leak gives us details about the European pricing and specifications of the phones. Oppo recently teased the arrival of the Reno 15 Pro, Reno 15 Pro Mini and Reno 15 in India. They will go on sale through Flipkart in the country.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series India Launch Date, Price Range Surface Online; Tipster Leaks Global Variant Price, Features

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra and Poco X8 Pro have reportedly appeared on Singapore’s IMDA certification database, suggesting their global variants are nearing launch. The listings confirm 5G support along with Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and NFC connectivity on both devices. The Poco X8 Pro is also tipped to support reverse wireless charging. The IMDA appearance hints at a Singapore launch, while the Poco X8 Pro has already received BIS, SGS, and EEC certifications, pointing to a broader international rollout.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra, Poco X8 Pro Listed on IMDA Database; Global Debut Expected Soon After Launch in China

description: Crypto markets remained subdued on Tuesday as Bitcoin dipped below the $88,000 (roughly Rs. 78.9 lakh) level amid consolidation and cautious positioning. Ethereum stayed resilient near the $3,000 (roughly Rs. 2.7 lakh) mark, while altcoins continued to lag due to thinning liquidity. Analysts said macro uncertainty, options expiry, and selective risk appetite are keeping markets range-bound in the near term.
title: Bitcoin Slips Below $88,000 Amidst Mixed Macro Signals, Cautious Investor Positioning

description: Motorola Edge 70 was recently launched in India by the tech firm. The handset is powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, which is paired with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage. Soon after its launch, the handset is now available for purchase in the country via Flipkart and Motorola India online store in three Pantone-curated colourways and a single storage option. It carries a triple rear camera setup, paired with an LED flash. The phone packs a 5,000mAh silicon carbon battery and supports 68W wired and 15W wireless fast charging.
title: Motorola Edge 70 With 5,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Camera Goes on Sale in India: Price, Offers, Features

description: Leaked software code suggests Samsung plans major camera upgrades for its next mid-range phones, the Galaxy A37 and Galaxy A57. A new report says both phones may use a new 50-megapixel main camera with a larger 1/1.56-inch sensor, improving low-light performance. The Galaxy A57 is tipped to get a better 13-megapixel ultra-wide camera, while the A37 uses an 8-megapixel unit. The phones could launch in early 2026.
title: Samsung Galaxy A37, Galaxy A57 Tipped to Launch With Notable Camera Upgrades

description: Anthropic has released an open-source tool called Bloom to test how AI models behave under normal and stressful conditions. Bloom automates behavioural testing by generating scenarios, running them at scale, and scoring responses for traits like bias or sycophancy. Anthropic says it simplifies a process that was previously manual and time-consuming.
title: Anthropic Releases New Open-Source Tool That Evaluates How AI Models Behave

description: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G and Realme 16 Pro 5G will launch in India next month. Now, Realme has announced that the Realme Buds Air 8 earphones will be launched alongside the smartphones. Both phones are confirmed to come with a 200-megapixel main rear camera. The Realme 16 Pro+ 5G will include a 50-megapixel periscope telephoto camera. They will run on Realme UI 7.0 based on Android 16.
title: Realme 16 Pro Series Camera Features Revealed; Realme Buds Air 8 Launch Date Announced

description: CES 2026 is all set to kick off on January 6. In recent weeks, brands have been announcing their upcoming innovations that will be showcased at the event. Samsung has now unveiled a teaser of the First Look 2026 show, which will provide an early glimpse of the company’s plans for incorporating vision-based AI features in its lineup of home appliances.
title: Samsung Showcases First Look 2026 Teaser Ahead of CES in January

description: 2025 was the year tech got personal. From AI-powered gadgets to smart homes, the next big thing arrived almost every month. Here is a list of tech our staff members actually loved and (some) even used. Keep reading to find out which ones made it to our list.
title: Top Tech 2025: Gadgets 360 Staff’s Favourite Picks of the Year

description: Hogwarts Legacy 2 could come with an online multiplayer component, a new job listing at Warner Bros. Games suggests. Warner Bros. is hiring for a role at Hogwarts Legacy developer Avalanche Software that will involve working on a “new online multiplayer RPG,” the job listing on the Warner Bros. website says.
title: Hogwarts Legacy 2 Could Feature Online Multiplayer, Warner Bros. Games Job Listing Suggests

description: A cybersecurity firm has warned of a surge in attacks targeting Microsoft 365 accounts by abusing Microsoft’s OAuth 2.0 device authorisation flow. The campaigns bypass multifactor authentication by tricking users into entering device codes on legitimate Microsoft login pages, granting attackers direct access without stealing passwords. Activity has reportedly increased since September 2025 and involves both cybercriminal and state-aligned groups. The company says the attacks enable data theft, lateral movement, and persistent access, and urges organisations to restrict device code authentication and strengthen user awareness.
title: Microsoft 365 Accounts Reportedly Breached After Hackers Exploit Legitimate Microsoft OAuth Feature

description: OpenAI has detailed how prompt injection attacks continue to pose a security challenge for AI browsers like ChatGPT Atlas. To counter this, the company has developed an AI-powered attacker that simulates real-world exploits during training. OpenAI said the approach helps identify weaknesses faster, while acknowledging that prompt injections require continuous mitigation rather than a permanent fix.
title: OpenAI Says Prompt Injections a Challenge for AI Browsers, Builds an Attacker to Train ChatGPT Atlas

description: Oppo Reno 15 FS 5G could be inching towards its launch. Ahead of the official reveal, it has appeared on an e-commerce website in Europe, along with price and specifications. It has a 6.57-inch AMOLED screen and a Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 chipset. It is listed with 8GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. The listing shows the phone with a triple rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary sensor. It has a 6,500mAh battery.
title: Oppo Reno 15 FS 5G Price and Specifications Surface on Retailer's Website, Could Launch Soon

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series, which is expected to include the standard Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+, and the Galaxy S26 Ultra, could be launched in global markets in February 2026. While its key specifications remain under wraps, it is widely expected to be powered by the South Korean tech giant's flagship Exynos 2600 chipset, which is built on a 3nm process. Now, a report states that the phones might not arrive with reduced power efficiency, as the Exynos 2600 SoC does not ship with an integrated modem.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Said to Feature External Modem on Models With Exynos 2600 SoC

description: Written by Man Gu, Shine On Me is a Korean Romance Drama web series that explores themes of romance and drama. The series is currently streaming on Netflix.
title: Shine On Me Now Streaming on Netflix: Know Everything About This Korean Romance Drama Series

description: Huawei MatePad 11.5 (2026) has been launched in China. It has an 11.5-inch display with 2.5K resolution and houses a 10,100mAh battery. The standard model runs on a Kirin T82B chipset coupled with up to 12GB RAM and up to 256GB storage. The Soft Light edition of the Huawei MatePad 11.5 uses the Kirin T82 chip.
title: Huawei MatePad 11.5 (2026) Launched With 2.5K Display, 10,100mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Starring Sooyong Choi and Kim Jae-Young in the lead roles, Idol I is a Korean web series that is now streaming exclusively on Netflix. It follows a criminal lawyer defending the case of her idol.
title: Idol I Streaming Now Online: Know Everything About Streaming, Plot, Cast, and More

description: Mufti Police is a Telugu crime thriller film that follows an investigation that is both intense and explores themes of crime, emotions, and uncovers dark secrets. Watch this film only on SunNXT.
title: Mufti Police Out on OTT: Know Where to Watch This Telugu Thriller Film Online

description: Spotify has identified and disabled various user accounts from its platform that were involved in scraping music files from its platform, according to a report. The music streaming service made the move after Anna's Archive, an open-source library, highlighted in a blog post that it had discovered a way to scrape Spotify at scale. As a result of this, the group said it has managed to scrape about 86 million music files, representing nearly 99.6 percent of Spotify's streams, of a total file size of a little under 300TB.
title: Spotify Reportedly Removes ‘Nefarious’ Accounts Used to Scrape About 86 Million Music Files

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra has surfaced with new camera details ahead of its December 25 China launch. Xiaomi CEO Lei Jun revealed that the phone will feature a Leica 1-inch Light and Shadow Master main camera using the Light and Shadow Hunter 1050L sensor with LOFIC ultra-high dynamic range technology for improved low-light photos and videos. The handset will also include a Leica-backed 200-megapixel optical zoom telephoto lens offering true optical output from 75mm to 100mm.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra to Launch With Upgraded Leica Camera System Featuring Continuous Optical Zoom

description: OpenAI announced the Your Year in Review feature for ChatGPT on Tuesday. Inspired by Spotify Wrapped, it is a personalised year-in-review experience for the app, which highlights the recurring themes from the conversations users have had with the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot throughout the year. The feature is currently limited to select markets and only in the English language, but accessible to all ChatGPT users irrespective of their subscription tiers.
title: ChatGPT Announces ‘Your Year With ChatGPT’ as a Personalised End-of-Year Experience
Inside the OPPO Find X9 Series: A Smarter Approach to Battery Life

description: OnePlus Turbo is rumoured to be launched in China soon as part of a new gaming-focused lineup. Ahead of its anticipated debut, key specifications of the purported handset have surfaced. According to a tipster, it will sport a BOE-sourced 165Hz flat display. The OnePlus Turbo may be powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chip, coupled with up to 16GB of RAM. The purported OnePlus handset was also listed on a benchmarking site, hinting towards its performance capabilities.
title: OnePlus Turbo Key Specifications Surface Ahead of Launch; Scores More Than 2.6 Million AnTuTu Points

description: The Realme Narzo 90x 5G will be available for purchase in India beginning today, December 23. The handset was launched in the country on December 16, alongside the Realme Narzo 90 5G. It is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset, paired with up to 8GB of LPDDR4x RAM, and up to 128GB of UFS 2.2 internal storage. The Realme Narzo 90x 5G sports a 6.80-inch LCD screen with a 144Hz refresh rate.
title: Realme Narzo 90x 5G Sale in India Begins Today: Price, Offers
